column4: Hi all! Can anybody help me find a compose sequence for "LATIN SMALL LETTER G WITH CIRCUMFLEX"?
did in work in the previous version?
I can't help you. But I wanted to say that it worked for me in 6.06 and then in 6.10, 7.04 it works no more. So I'll just leave without it.
well I cannot. It's a laptop, and I need a sleep mode badly
check out the forums if you haven't done already. Look for your specific model.
I tried. It seems like people have terrible problems with hibernate and sleep on 7.04, but the symptoms are not the same
actually I've been thinking on going back to 6.06. And you should think if you really need the new things 7.04 has to offer with respect to 6.10, maybe you could go  back too.
your symptoms are exactly the same as mine. The screen goes off, but it doesn't really sleep. It just hangs.
I'm thinking of upgrading to 7.10 tribe 3...
but I'm kinda scared a little

these things depend on kernel modules that control the power saving features, like acpi, so instead of downgrading or upgrading you need to identify the specific problem, that is, the specific version of the module that gave problems.
I know that. But I'm not that mastered in kernel modules :(
you may as well get the version from 6.10 and recompile it for your current 7.04 then talk to the developers to see what went wrong. I would say, yes, it hard to debug.
